issue.message: This call is to a method from API 28, the call containing class androidx.arch.core.executor.DefaultTaskExecutor is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 28. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(28) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(28).
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#nullability-annotations
